graphql.query:
query list(
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!
){
    banner_list(
        search_by:$search_by,
        search_value:$search_value,
        order_by:$order_by,
        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset:$offset,
        limit:$limit
    )
    {
        id,
        title,
        content,
        image_url
    }
}

query list(
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!
){
    category_list(
        search_by:$search_by,

        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset:$offset,
        limit:$limit
    )
    {
        id,
        name,
        image_url
    }
}

query list(
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,

){
    teacher_list(

query list(
    $category_id:String!,
    $teacher_id:String!,
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!
){
    course_list(
        category_id : $category_id,
        teacher_id : $teacher_id,
        search_by:$search_by,
        search_value:$search_value,
        order_by:$order_by,
        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset:$offset,
        limit:$limit
    )
    {
        id,
        course_name,
        image_url,
        teacher { id, name, email } ,
        category {id, name, image_url},
        course_details { id,course_id , overview_text, description_text,image_url }
    }
}

query list(
    $course_id:String!,
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!
){
    course_detail_list(
        course_id : $course_id,
        search_by:$search_by,
        search_value:$search_value,
        order_by:$order_by,
        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset:$offset,
        limit:$limit
    )
    {
        id,
        course_id,
        overview_text,
        description_text,
        image_url
    }
}

mutation update(
    $id:String!,
    $course_id:String!,
    $overview_text:String!,
    $description_text:String!,
    $image_url:String!
){
    course_detail_update(
        id:$id,
        course_id : $course_id,
        overview_text:$overview_text,
        description_text:$description_text,
        image_url:$image_url
    )
    {
        id,
        course_id,
        overview_text,
        description_text,
        image_url
    }
}

query list(
    $course_id:String!,
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!
){
    course_material_list(
        course_id : $course_id,
        search_by:$search_by,
        search_value:$search_value,
        order_by:$order_by,
        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset:$offset,
        limit:$limit
    )
    {
        id,
        course_id,
        material_index,
        title
    }
}

mutation add(
    $course_material_id:String!,
    $position:Int!,
    $title:String!,
    $type_material:Int!,
    $content:String!,
    $image_url:String!
){
    course_material_detail_register(
        course_material_id : $course_material_id,
        position : $position,
        title  : $title,
        type_material : $type_material,
        content  : $content,
        image_url : $image_url,
    )
    {
        id,
        course_material_id,
        position,
        title,
        type_material,
        content,
        image_url
    }
}

mutation update(
    $id:String!,
    $course_material_id:String!,
    $position:Int!,
    $title:String!,
    $type_material:Int!,
    $content:String!,
    $image_url:String!
){
    course_material_detail_update(
        id:$id,
        course_material_id : $course_material_id,
        position : $position,
        title  : $title,
        type_material : $type_material,
        content  : $content,
        image_url : $image_url,
    )
    {
        id
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation add(
    $course_id:String!,
    $type_exam:Int!,
    $exam_index:Int!,
    $text:String!,
    $image_url:String!
){
    course_exam_register(
        course_id : $course_id,
        type_exam :  $type_exam,
        exam_index : $exam_index,
        text :$text,
        image_url : $image_url
    )
    {
        id,
        course_id,
        type_exam,
        exam_index,
        text,
        image_url,
        answers {
            id,
            course_exam_id,
            type_answer,
            label,
            text,
            image_url
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
query list(
    $course_id : String!,
    $search_by:String!,
    $search_value:String!,
    $order_by:String!,
    $order_dir:String!,
    $offset:Int!,
    $limit:Int!,
    $limit_answer:Int!
){
    course_exam_list(
        course_id : $course_id,
        search_by:$search_by,
        search_value:$search_value,
        order_by:$order_by,
        order_dir:$order_dir,
        offset: $offset,
        limit:$limit,
        limit_answer : $limit_answer
    )
    {
        id,
        course_id,
        type_exam,
        exam_index,
        text,
        image_url,
        answers {
            id,
            course_exam_id,
            type_answer,
            label,
            text,
            image_url
        }
    }
}
